descr.p: The jsonparser unit provides a parser for data encoded in JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format. It implements TJSONParser class that can parse JSON strings and streams into TJSONData objects.

element.name: fpJSON
element.short: JSON data structures and base types

descr.p: TJSONParser is a parser class for reading JSON data from streams or strings. It extends TBaseJSONReader and builds a tree of TJSONData objects representing the parsed JSON structure.

element.name: TJSONParser.Parse
element.short: Parses JSON data and returns root object

descr.p: Parse reads and parses JSON data from the input stream, building a complete tree of JSON objects. It returns the root TJSONData object representing the entire parsed JSON structure.

element.name: TJSONParser.Parse.Result
element.short: Root JSON data object representing parsed structure

element.name: EJSONParser
element.short: Exception class for JSON parsing errors

descr.p: EJSONParser is an alias for the JSON parser exception class defined in the jsonreader unit. It is raised when syntax errors or other parsing problems are encountered during JSON parsing.
